name: Paper Adhesive Tape
description: The particularly environmentally friendly alternative made of kraft paper with good adhesive strength through natural rubber adhesive is the ideal solution for sustainable, reliable, and professional sealing of cartons. The kraft paper adhesive tape is perfect for companies that value ecological packaging solutions – completely plastic-free. Thanks to the writable surface, the tape can be easily marked with notes, logos, or comments. Due to the possibility of three-color printing, the adhesive tape is excellent for personalized or brand-related packaging.

name: PVC Adhesive Tape - Extra Strong
description: The PVC adhesive tape in transparent combines discreet design with powerful performance. Ideal for applications where labels, prints or logos on the packaging should remain visible.

name: Paper Adhesive Tape
description: This Kraft paper tape is an environmentally friendly alternative for your packaging needs. Thanks to the natural rubber adhesive, it offers excellent adhesion while remaining sustainable. The tape can be processed easily without a dispenser and is easily tearable by hand, making it particularly convenient to use.

description: Original 3M - Quality filament self-adhesive packing tape. Highest transport security through glass fiber reinforced brand adhesive tape from 3M.

name: PVC packing tape, brown
description: This PVC adhesive tape embossed with a light surface embossing is the ideal helper for those who value secure packaging and comfortable handling. Thanks to the structured surface, it can be especially quiet and evenly unwound – perfect for daily use in shipping, storage, or retail. Whether neutral or individually printed: This tape combines function with a professional appearance.
